Document:
# Aberrant Flesh
A shambling mass of flesh, animated through anomalous energy. Even though the anomaly that created them was long gone, the creatures were resilient enough to survive on their own. Not much is known about their life cycle or biological program, however, it is clear that they will attack and consume any biological life forms and will attack anything they consider a threat.
For the most part, aberrant flesh monsters utilize brute force and numerical advantage to eliminate threats however some of them developed means of inflicting damage from afar.
# Known variants ## "Jared"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 50 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s)[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Mindless brutes that will attempt to close the distance without the slightest concern for their survival. Appears to be more fragile than an average human.
[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [italic]an average healthy unburdened human being run (walk) speed is 4.5 m/s (2.5 m/s).[/italic]
## "Golem"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 70 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Walk/run speed:[/color][/bold] 3 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Just like "Jareds", "Golems" are mindless brutes, but they appear to be heavier in their build, making them slightly more resilient than "Jareds" but less agile at the same time.
## "Clamp"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 40 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Walk/run speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=yellow]Pierce[/color], [color=lime]Toxin[/color] (bone spike); [color=red]Slash[/color] (maw) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier, Shooter: bone spike / maw
"Clamps" are flying variants that developed mutations enabling them to shoot biological projectiles: either [color=#a4885c]bone spikes[/color] containing harmful chemicals or [color=#a4885c]maws[/color].
## "Maw"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 12 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Walk/run speed:[/color][/bold] 0 m/s (0 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Immobile flesh boring creatures, that will attach themselves to the target and start gnawing through their way inside.
## "Lover"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 30 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Walk/run speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier
Akin to "Jareds" and "Golems", but is capable of flying.
## "Horror"
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health pool:[/color][/bold] 200 - [bold][color=#a4885c]Walk/run speed:[/color][/bold] 3.8 m/s (3.8 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage types:[/color][/bold] [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
Tougher and more resilient than the average aberrant flesh monster. Sharp bone protrusions and highly developed musculature allow aberrant flesh horror to rend the flesh of its victims and tear through armor with efficiency.
# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]aberrant flesh horror[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]flesh clumps[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
